name: Senior Connection
description: Bayview Senior Services (BSS) helps navigate the complicated systems of social services and health care for seniors and persons living with disabilities citywide. Senior Connections provides: - Adult with Disabilities Resource Center - Searching for the resources and making the links that allow seniors and persons with disabilities to get the help that they need. - Case Management - Help with navigating the complicated systems of social services and health care so that people can age in place. -
